thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 8 de 714
thread.title: Michael Maison

author: Michael Maison
title: Michael Maison
text: Fast and easy collection with the ticket process and friendly staff who fully explained all aspects of the rental and gave 3 different options on insurance methods and explained the pro and cons of each.. drop off was even quicker, and the fuel deposit refunded extremely quickly, excellent service I will be using goldcar for all my future rentals when in Spain
